column1: Attack: If I have 8+ Power, give me Fearsome, Overwhelm, and SpellShield this round.

"It is said that hundreds of years ago, the river Khaleek bore a great trading outpost known as Taraleek upon its shores. That is, until one fateful day, when a mighty beast broke through the ground, and annihilated both the outpost and all who called it home. But what monster could do such a thing?" - Shuriman historian
